text:
We can no longer tolerate farm bankruptcies in the Midwest being at their highest level in a decade, while the CEO who controls Smithfield Foods got a $291 million compensation package in 2017.

Let me be clear: We need more family farms in America, not more factory farms.

As families across America come together to celebrate the Holy month of Ramadan, we hope that this sacred time brings happiness, wisdom and countless blessings to you and your loved ones. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D50qN-jWwAABhL2.jpg

Wishing them godspeed on the important mission they are preparing for in defense of freedom & our national security. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D51UaoFXsAAzTNJ.jpg

It’s time we had a leader who speaks out against hate in all its forms. 

It’s time we had a President who’s not scared to call neo-Nazi violence what it is: domestic terrorism.

I know we are better than this. #NAACPDetroit

When Black churches are burned to the ground in Louisiana - that is terrorism. 2018 was the deadliest year on record for domestic terrorism since the Oklahoma City Bombing more than 20 years ago. And as President, I won’t feed it. I won’t ignore it. And I won’t tolerate it.

Are you ready for something truly insane?

Farmers aren’t allowed to repair their own tractors without paying an authorized John Deere repair agent.

It’s outrageous. https://slate.com/news-and-politics/2019/05/florida-senate-approves-making-felons-pay-up-to-have-right-to-vote-restored.html

Last night, Adam Sandler sang a beautiful (if slightly off color) tribute to Chris Farley. Farley brought laughter to millions — from SNL classics to Tommy Boy. He died far too young. #RIP https://twitter.com/nbcsnl/status/1124903936799006720 QT @nbcsnl Ending the night with @AdamSandler's tribute to Chris Farley. 💌 #SNL http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D5x1ocPWkAEkfzK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1124902708257992704/vid/320x180/u4WR_Cosf6CfUdrk.mp4?tag=12

Right now we have a President who would rather give a teacher a gun than give a teacher a raise. That must end. #NAACPDetroit

While corporate profits soar in agribusiness, thousands of family farmers are forced off their land every year. As President, I’ll pass the largest tax cut for middle-class and working families in a generation. Families making less than $100,000 a year would receive $6,000 that they can access at up to $500 a month. #NAACPDetroit

Our party is not white or Black...Hispanic or Asian...immigrant or indigenous. It is all of us.

This is our Party. This is the America we believe in.

And it’s the America I’ll always fight for as President. #NAACPDetroit
Wishing a peaceful, blessed Ramadan to all our Muslim communities observing the holy month. Ramadan Mubarak!

Murder rates for Native women & girls are horrifyingly high. This is a crisis. On National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls, we renew our commitment to reauthorizing the Violence Against Women Act, & ending this epidemic of violence. #MMIWG https://twitter.com/repdebhaaland/status/1124027094927855616 QT @RepDebHaaland Take a moment to read my @guardianopinion piece on the #SilentCrisis of missing and murdered indigenous women. #MMIW https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2019/may/02/missing-murdered-indigenous-women-deb-haaland
The system is in need of reform—so let’s have people on the inside prepared to use their power to open doors and prepared to implement the agenda to make the system more fair and just. #NAACPDetroit

The number of farms taking advantage of renewable energy has more than doubled since 2007. That is good, but for the future of the planet we must do better. 

We can create millions of jobs by moving to 100% sustainable energy.

I’m fed up with the inaction on gun violence. People are dying. Too many lives have been lost and too many communities are left to heal. We need leaders who will address this horrifying epidemic and have the courage to speak up.

Farmers have some of the highest uninsured rates in America—41% of dairy farmers lack health insurance.

If we are going to truly stand with rural American we must guarantee health care as a human right through Medicare for All.
If you paid 1 cent in federal income taxes last year, you paid more than John Deere – a company that made a $2.2 billion in profit last year. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D50gfXOWwAA4-Mi.jpg

Factory farms are responsible for 1.4 trillion pounds of animal waste in America. They are a threat to the water we drink and the air we breathe, and it is unbelievable to me that Republicans in Congress have been working overtime to exempt factory farms from environmental laws.

We can't let this go unnoticed: last week the White House rolled out a plan to allow health care providers to cite their religious or moral beliefs to *deny* treatments to patients. This is absurd and flies in the face of putting patients first.

It's been 65 years since Emmett Till, 52 years since three young Black men were killed at the Algiers Motel and seven years since Trayvon Martin. Yet, this is still everyday life for young Black people in America. Let's speak that truth. #NAACPDetroit

We must ensure tuition-free college for all, funded by a tax on Wall Street greed. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1123942751278649347 QT @nytimes In the coming weeks, thousands of college students in the US will walk across a stage and proudly accept their diplomas.
